useCase.name: Process USDT Payment

preconditions.precondition: User has selected to pay with USDT

useCase.trigger: User decides to pay with USDT

mainSequence.step: User decides to pay with USDT
UI requests payment information from Gateway
Gateway provides USDT deposit address and amount to User, including QR code
Monitor detects the transaction on Blockchain
Monitor requests transaction confirmation from Blockchain
Monitor receives confirmation and notifies Gateway of final transaction approval
Gateway stores transaction and user information in Database
Database confirms payment and converts it to points for User
